comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content:
Aircraft was leased from Glenn Curtiss ( Aero Club of America Pilot #1) by Charles K. Hamilton  (Aero Club of America Pilot # 12)   The aircraft used in the first flight in Seattle was the same aircraft  ( Rheims Racer  ) used by Glenn Curtiss to win Gordon Bennett Aviation Cup at Rheims , France  August 28,1909   Coupe-Gordon-Bennett  the fastest airplane in the world 
47.06 mph.
